verses.name: Ezekiel 12:25
verses.text: For I am the Lord: I will speak, and the word that I shall speak shall come to pass; it shall be no more prolonged: for in your days, O rebellious house, will I say the word, and will perform it, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:26
verses.text: Again the word of the Lord came to me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:27
verses.text: Son of man, behold, they of the house of Israel say, The vision that he seeth is for many days to come, and he prophesieth of the times that are far off.
